title: Warding initiatives (convincing people to ward in games at low elo)
body:
I feel like wards are very lacking in my elo (bronze 2 so not great) and it's having a negative impact on my games. I (adc main) almost always have my pink ward out and did the same with green wards before they were removed but i often get matched with supports who don't even buy sightstone and am usually the only player with a pink on the map. 

 If those who don't ward had some sort of incentive to place wards other than the obvious vision advantage, people would quickly develop habit of warding effectively. 

eg. Every time you place a pink ward, you get 5 ip and also get 5 ip for every minute that ward stays alive (to encourage contesting wards). this would work out to an extra 100 - 200 ip per game (depending on length) which isn't an enormous amount but also is more than enough to convince people to ward and have a positive impact on the game if only for extra ip. The values aren't really important, it's more about the reward for warding at all that makes the difference.

You'd have to work out something different for sightstone but even making sure that every player has a pink ward down at all times with a method similar to this would have enormously positive impact at lower elo and also help the players at higher elo who already do ward to afford the specialised runes they need to compete.

replies.body: This could be abused tho. People could just put it in fountain and then it stays there the whole game, and it gives no assistance to the team whatsoever.
